description:
Sarutobi and Kasugarun run into trouble after making their way into Osaka Castle. Meanwhile, Mori unleashes the true power of his mobile fortress, much to Sanada’s  alarm.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hasou Toyotomi Daihontai! Honki no Keiji, Danchou no Battou!!
Toyotomi`s Great Main Army Dashes for Supremacy! Earnest Keiji Draws Sword in Heartbreak!
覇走豊臣大本隊! 本気の慶次, 断腸の抜刀!!
